member.name: T:StringFormat.TokenStringFormat
member.summary: The primary class for accessing the functionality of the StringFormat library.

member.name: M:StringFormat.TokenStringFormat.Format(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Formats the string using the placeholder for the property names.
member.param: The object to pull the values from. Usually an anonymous type.

member.name: M:StringFormat.TokenStringFormat.Format(System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Formats the string using the placeholder for the property names.
member.param: The provider to use for formatting dates and numeric values.
The object to pull the values from. Usually an anonymous type.

member.name: M:StringFormat.TokenStringFormat.Format(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Formats the string using the placeholder for the property names.
member.param: The dictionary to pull the values from.

member.name: M:StringFormat.TokenStringFormat.Format(System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Formats the string using the placeholder for the property names.
member.param: The provider to use for formatting dates and numeric values.
The dictionary to pull the values from.

member.name: M:StringFormat.TokenStringFormat.TokenizeString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the format string with the tokens replaced as ordinals. Exposed for developer benefit. Most likely used only in debugging.
member.returns: A string where the tokens are replaced with ordinal values.

member.name: M:StringFormat.TokenStringFormat.TokenizeString(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}@)
member.summary: Returns the format string with the tokens replaced as ordinals. Exposed for developer benefit. Most likely used only in debugging.
member.param: The tokens that were extracted from the format string.
member.returns: A string where the tokens are replaced with ordinal values.
